channel.title: Can anyone help?
channel.description: When I try to log in it says "Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click "Cancel" and then "Start Server" to make your own." But when I do that, I get the same response. Can anyone help?

item.title: Can anyone help?
item.dc:creator: @lamename5 lamename5
item.description:
@lamename5 wrote:

If your trying to start your own
server, don’t forget to click the “run” button
in the server files. lol

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone help?
item.dc:creator: @Tyman2007 Tyman2007
item.description:
@Tyman2007 wrote:

I think he means a “Local” server or a “Computer Specific” one.

It’s a strange error. Try updating your Java JDK/JRE to v 1.6_07

If you already have it all updated then im afraid its either the client your using or the server your using.

Try connecting to another person’s server. If you WERE trying to connect to another person’s server then the server is probably down.

There may be many reasons for this, but im stating only the ones i can see.

One more thing. if you tried to connect to another person’s server and it gave that error, then you clicked start server and tried again, make sure that you have the IP set to 127.0.0.1

Also, make sure that your port is set to 43594 (The default port).

If you’re unsure about if its set to that or a different default port, then just set the port # to that.

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone help?
item.dc:creator: @Skillz4me Skillz4me
item.description:
@Skillz4me wrote:

Maybe the server is down or is at max Cappacity. Try logging on at a diffrent time or the server may be false

Read full topic
